string.name: gvr_vr_mode_component
string.description: Google VR component name used for enabling VR mode

resources.string: No session detected ! Please copy your pictures to Android/data/ch.epfl.mmspg.testbed360/files.
Click on a session to start it :
There was an error while loading images, please try again later
We will first need you to allow Testbed 360 to read and write files, in order to display pictures and track the user\'s movements :
You have now finished the session.\n Please give the headset back to the supervisor.\n Thanks for your time !
